content: The **Remaking Singapore Committee** (**RSC**) was established in February 2002 to complement the work of the Economic Review Committee of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It was led by then-[Minister of State for National Development](/wiki/Ministry_of_National_Development_(Singapore)) [Vivian Balakrishnan](/wiki/Vivian_Balakrishnan). - Remaking Singapore website - Full Report of the Remaking Singapore Committee This Singaporean organisation article is a stub. title: Remaking Singapore Committee
